class.name: DiscordCall
class.brief_description: <para>Class that manages an active voice session in a Lobby. </para>

method.name: error_to_string
method.description: <para>Converts the <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Call_1a92b477828e777e1cab576821a170dff0" kindref="member">Error</ref> enum to a string. </para>

method.name: get_audio_mode
method.description: <para>Returns whether the call is configured to use voice auto detection or push to talk for the current user. </para>

method.name: get_channel_id
method.description: <para>Returns the ID of the lobby with which this call is associated. </para>

method.name: get_guild_id
method.description: <para>Returns the ID of the lobby with which this call is associated. </para>

method.name: get_local_mute
method.description: <para>Returns whether the current user has locally muted the given userId for themselves. </para>

method.name: get_participant_volume
method.description: <para>Returns the locally set playout volume of the given userId. </para> <para>Does not affect the volume of this user for any other connected clients. The range of volume is [0, 200], where 100 indicate default audio volume of the playback device. </para>

method.name: get_participants
method.description: <para>Returns a list of all of the user IDs of the participants in the call. </para>

method.name: get_pttactive
method.description: <para>Returns whether push to talk is currently active, meaning the user is currently pressing their configured push to talk key. </para>

method.name: get_pttrelease_delay
method.description: <para>Returns the time that PTT is active after the user releases the PTT key and SetPTTActive(false) is called. </para>

method.name: get_self_deaf
method.description: <para>Returns whether the current user is deafened. </para>

method.name: get_self_mute
method.description: <para>Returns whether the current user's microphone is muted. </para>

method.name: get_status
method.description: <para>Returns the current call status. </para> <para>A call is not ready to be used until the status changes to "Connected". </para>

method.name: get_vadthreshold
method.description: <para>Returns the current configuration for void auto detection thresholds. See the description of the VADThreshold struct for specifics. </para>

method.name: get_voice_state_handle
method.description: <para>Returns a reference to the <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1VoiceStateHandle" kindref="compound">VoiceStateHandle</ref> for the user ID of the given call participant. </para> <para>The <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1VoiceStateHandle" kindref="compound">VoiceStateHandle</ref> allows other users to know if the target user has muted or deafened themselves. </para>

method.name: set_audio_mode
method.description: <para>Sets whether to use voice auto detection or push to talk for the current user on this call. </para> <para>If using push to talk you should call <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Call_1ac442b1d69b9256abbb188583c0c81c41" kindref="member">SetPTTActive()</ref> whenever the user presses their confused push to talk key. </para>

method.name: set_local_mute
method.description: <para>Locally mutes the given userId, so that the current user cannot hear them anymore. </para> <para>Does not affect whether the given user is muted for any other connected clients. </para>

method.name: set_on_voice_state_changed_callback
method.description: <para>Sets a callback function to generally be invoked whenever a field on a <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1VoiceStateHandle" kindref="compound">VoiceStateHandle</ref> object for a user would have changed. </para> <para>For example when a user mutes themselves, all other connected clients will invoke the VoiceStateChanged callback, because the "self mute" field will be true now. The callback is generally not invoked when users join or leave channels. </para>

method.name: set_participant_changed_callback
method.description: <para>Sets a callback function to be invoked whenever some joins or leaves a voice call. </para>

method.name: set_participant_volume
method.description: <para>Locally changes the playout volume of the given userId. </para> <para>Does not affect the volume of this user for any other connected clients. The range of volume is [0, 200], where 100 indicate default audio volume of the playback device. </para>

method.name: set_pttactive
method.description: <para>When push to talk is enabled, this should be called whenever the user pushes or releases their configured push to talk key. This key must be configured in the game, the SDK does not handle keybinds itself. </para>

method.name: set_pttrelease_delay
method.description: <para>If set, extends the time that PTT is active after the user releases the PTT key and SetPTTActive(false) is called. </para> <para>Defaults to no release delay, but we recommend setting to 20ms, which is what Discord uses. </para>

method.name: set_self_deaf
method.description: <para>Mutes all audio from the currently active call for the current user. They will not be able to hear any other participants, and no other participants will be able to hear the current user either. </para>

method.name: set_self_mute
method.description: <para>Mutes the current user's microphone so that no other participant in their active calls can hear them. </para>

method.name: set_speaking_status_changed_callback
method.description: <para>Sets a callback function to be invoked whenever a user starts or stops speaking and is passed in the userId and whether they are currently speaking. </para> <para>It can be invoked in other cases as well, such as if the priority speaker changes or if the user plays a soundboard sound. </para>

method.name: set_status_changed_callback
method.description: <para>Sets a callback function to be invoked when the call status changes, such as when it fully connects or starts reconnecting. </para>

method.name: set_vadthreshold
method.description: <para>Customizes the void auto detection thresholds for picking up activity from a user's mic. </para> <para><itemizedlist> <listitem><para>When automatic is set to True, Discord will automatically detect the appropriate threshold to use.</para> </listitem><listitem><para>When automatic is set to False, the given threshold value will be used. Threshold has a range of -100, 0, and defaults to -60. </para> </listitem></itemizedlist> </para>

method.name: status_to_string
method.description: <para>Converts the <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Call_1a9a8311653be2263ad61243749ff44d4e" kindref="member">Status</ref> enum to a string. </para>
